text: A very rich man fed a goose and a swan together, but each with a different purpose: one for singing and the other for the table. When the goose was fed, it was night, and the darkness made it impossible to distinguish between the two birds. Capturing the swan instead of the goose, he sang his beautiful death song. Hearing his voice, the master recognized him and his singing saved him from death. Don't act on someone without knowing their true identity.
title: El cisne tomado por ganso
author: nan Esopo
